backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping required site features to the files and components that implement them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode colors, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/404.html: Static redirect page that forwards all unknown routes back to the main app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages wrapped in the shared layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header navigation with logo, desktop and mobile menus, and active-link styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing academy branding, description, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering the header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized site content including hero text, courses, benefits, and about information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to the userâ€™s identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a placeholder hook returning no queries for this static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, teaching approach, and reasons to choose the service using site content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact page with contact info and a form that opens a mailto link on submit.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for each course including overview, audience, and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, course previews, and benefits sections.
frontend/src/pages/TutorsPage.tsx: Renders the Tutors page, displaying placeholder tutor profiles from siteContent with sections for bio, experience, and languages, plus a note instructing updates to the content file.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, features, requirements, image needs, and current progress for building the multi-page academy website.
